column8: at his home. a memorial service will be 11 a. m. june 23
column10: at rossell funeral home. the family will receive friends 6-8 p. m. monday at the funeral home. if desired
column11: memorial contributions may be made to the american heart association. ralph was born in flint
column14: the son of ralph and norene (rolfe) hawkins. he was a graduate of flushing high school. ralph had been employed by general motors for over 30 years. he was a licensed scuba diver instructor. ralph's hobbies included photography and electronics and he enjoyed playing chess and backgammon. he is survived by his son
column15: james and wife angie hawkins of birch run; four grandchildren
column20: brent hawkins of flushing; three sisters
column23: brenda and husband ken faber of flushing; several nieces
column24: nephews and great nieces and great-nephews. ralph was preceded in death by his parents; son
